extension.description:
The Android-App is currently in beta. To participate in the beta-test you have to join the linuxwhatelse community on Google+ http://goo.gl/UvMw3n
Features: - Display a QR-Code for easy setup (Go to Programs and launch Notify) - Display notifications of your phone right in Kodi - On incoming-/outgoing calls, pause / mute the playback or simply lower the volume
